subject: A prediction that came true
author: Adriana Jones
full_text:
Since predictions seem to be popular on these boards I thought I'd post this

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r7QAZPb-IEQ&feature=related

I found this video posted on www.prophecies.us
Regular Joes and Janes post their  predictions there.  I've followed this site a year and a half now, and they've had some predictions that came true.  If you're into predictions, I highly recommend this site.
